FBOpen Docs

FBOpen helps small businesses search for opportunities to work with the U.S. government.

Welcome to FBOpen Docs

FBOpen is a search API of opportunities to work with the U.S. government.

  • Our API documentation is at here.
  • Visit the demo website: fbopen.gsa.gov.
  • Learn more about the data in FBOpen. Weâ€™re currently indexing data from FedBizOpps (including attachments) and Grants.gov.

About the FBOpen API

FBOpen is a thin search RESTful API fronted by the awesome api.data.gov and backed by a search indexing server. Visit our API documentation at 18f.github.io/fbopen.

We have used this approach, which we named Beckley, as a model for other projects. Beckley, which is implemented in nodeJS and ExpressJS, is also available on GitHub.

Recent Blog Posts about FBOpen

  • 18F Shows What Is Possible in Government With FBOpen API Cross-posted from API Evangelist
  • Announcing FBOpen: Government opportunities made easier

We Welcome Your Feedback

Please reach out to us with your feedback, questions, ideas, and concerns! Email us at fbopen@gsa.gov, tweet at @fbopen, or create a GitHub issue. We are very interested in your feedback about FBOpen AND FedBizOpps.

   

FBOpen is an 18F project, a startup within GSA that builds effective, user-centric digital services focused on the interaction between government and the people and businesses it serves.
